segments.text: Has anyone told you about Jessica's party coming up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was told about it already . I'm just waiting for my invitation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is that right ? I already got my invitation from her earlier .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I believe that she will give me the invitation today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you even going to go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , it sounds like it's going to be the best party of the year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Exactly , it seems like it's going to be loads of fun .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When exactly does the party start ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The invitation says it starts at 8
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Has she given out a lot of invitations yet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have no idea , she hasn't given out many though .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm planning on going , but I really need her to give me my invitation .
segments.speaker: S2
